items.content_html: A TypeScript backend using a lightweight framework inspired by Spring, integrating Fastify for the HTTP layer and WebSocket support, designed to convert YouTube videos into MP3 audio files.
items.title: Frm2003/mp3-player-back: A TypeScript backend using a lightweight framework inspired by Spring, integrating Fastify for the HTTP layer and WebSocket support, designed to convert YouTube videos into MP3 audio files.

items.content_html: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency
items.title: tibetty/osm2geojson-lite: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency

items.title: reececomo/gcomply: Lightweight automatic grammar agreement engine for JavaScript/TypeScript

items.content_html: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.
items.title: Just-Cr8if/tapd-react-sdk: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: üîê A lightweight Zero-Knowledge SDK to prove that a private value is greater than or equal to a threshold ‚Äî without revealing the actual value. Built using Circom and snarkjs, this SDK is suitable for decentralized applications that require selective disclosure with strong privacy guarantees.
items.title: fsegall/zk-threshold-proof: üîê A lightweight Zero-Knowledge SDK to prove that a private value is greater than or equal to a threshold ‚Äî without revealing the actual value.  Built using Circom and snarkjs, this SDK is suitable for decentralized applications that require selective disclosure with strong privacy guarantees.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight and fully typed SDK for interacting with the LG SmartThinQ / LG Developers API. This package provides an easy-to-use, TypeScript-first client for managing and controlling LG smart devices via official API routes.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
